author: @dmitriy2987
text:
한국어 가사:

11:11, 천사들 내 침대
윌 맴돌 때 (애-애-애-애-애)
난 성냥을 켠 채
까만 밤에 잠겨서 소원해 (애-애-애-애)
나약함을 거둬 새롭게 하소서
I want you to stop time, 불꽃이 날 태우는 이 순간
마침내 나 숨 쉬려 해
아픔이란 파도에 부서지는 재가 되어, live again
Like, oh, oh, oh
아플수록 alive, 재 속에서 새롭게 태어나
Nothing lasts forever, baby
다시 피어나려 해, 내 온몸에 기름 붓고, light the flame
Like, oh, oh, oh, I don't wanna stop
Don't be afraid, 천사들 속삭여 내게
이 암흑이 널 빚어내, feel the feelings you never felt
몇 번이고 태워도, 태워 더 can't get enough
Oh, no, oh, no
검게 남을 나를 빛나게 하소서
I want you to stop time, 불꽃이 날 태우는 이 순간
마침내 나 숨 쉬려 해
아픔이란 파도에 부서지는 재가 되어 live again
Like, oh, oh, oh
아플수록 alive, 재 속에서 새롭게 태어나
Nothing lasts forever, baby
다시 피어나려 해, 내 온몸에 기름 붓고, light the flame
Like, oh, oh, oh, I don't wanna stop
아름다워 new life, 새살 내게 돋아나는 순간
껍질을 다 벗은 끝에
12시에 시작될 새로워진 날을 향해 spread my wings
Like, oh, oh, oh
아플수록 alive, 재 속에서 새롭게 태어나
Nothing lasts forever, baby
타올라 더 파랗게 불길 속에 남을 나의 발자취
Like, oh, oh, oh


English lyrics:

Eleven-eleven
When the angels circle around my bed
I light a match
And wish, locked in the black night

[Pre-Chorus]
Take away my weakness
Make me new

[Chorus]
I want you to stop time
This moment when the flames burn me
Finally, I try to breathe
Becoming ash in the wave of pain
Live again
Like oh, oh, oh

[Post-Chorus]
The more it hurts, the more I'm alive
Born anew from the ashes
Nothing lasts forever, baby
I try to bloom again
Pouring oil all over my body and light the flame
Like oh, oh, oh
I don't wanna stop

Don't be afraid
The angels whisper to me
This darkness shapes you
Feel the feelings you never felt
Even if I burn again and again, I burn more
Can't get enough
Oh, no, oh, no

[Pre-Chorus]
Make me shine
Even though I'll remain black

[Chorus]
I want you to stop time
This moment when the flames burn me
Finally, I try to breathe
Becoming ash in the wave of pain
Live again
Like oh, oh, oh

[Post-Chorus]
The more it hurts, the more I'm alive
Born anew from the ashes
Nothing lasts forever, baby
I try to bloom again
Pouring oil all over my body and light the flame
Like oh, oh, oh
I don't wanna stop

[Refrain]
Even if I burn again and again, I burn more
Can't get enough
Oh, no, oh, no

[Chorus]
Beautiful new life
The moment new skin grows on me
After shedding all the shells
At 12 o'clock, a new day will begin
Heading toward the renewed day, spread my wings
Like oh, oh, oh

[Post-Chorus]
The more it hurts, the more I'm alive
Born anew from the ashes
Nothing lasts forever, baby
Burning more, bluer
My footprints remaining in the flames
Like oh, oh, oh

author: @shizukakudo4701
text:
11:11 When angels hover over my bed
I light a match
Trapped in the dark night, I make a wish.

"Take away my weakness, make me anew"

I want you to stop time
At the moment the flames consume me I finally try to breathe.
Becoming ashes, Breaking upon the waves of pain I live again
Like oh, oh, oh

The more it hurts the more I feel alive
From the ashes I am reborn
Nothing lasts forever, baby.
Trying to bloom again
I pour oil on my whole body and light the flame
Like oh, oh, oh
I don’t wanna stop

"Don’t be afraid"
The angels whisper to me
"This darkness has shaped you,
Feel the feelings you’ve never felt"
No matter how many times I burn, I burn even more
I can’t get enough

Oh no, oh no

I remain in the darkness 
But let me shine

I want you to stop time
At the moment the flames consume me I finally try to breathe.
Becoming ashes, Breaking upon the waves of pain I live again
Like oh, oh, oh

The more it hurts, the more I feel alive 
From the ashes I am reborn
Nothing lasts forever, baby
Trying to bloom again
I pour oil on my whole body and light the flame.
Like oh, oh, oh
I don’t wanna stop

A beautiful new life
The moment new flesh begins to grow
After I've shed my old skin 
Towards the new day that begins at midnight
I spread my wings
Like oh, oh, oh.

The more it hurts the more I am alive
Reborn from the ashes
Nothing lasts forever, baby
Burning and becoming even bluer
My footprints will remain in the flames.
Like oh, oh, oh

author: @dkwigo
text:
Burmese Translation 
11:11
နတ်သားတွေ ငါ့အိပ်ရာနား ဝိုင်းရံနေတဲ့အချိန်  
ငါ့မှာ ဆုတောင်းတစ်ခုရှိတယ်
အဲ့တာက
မှောင်မိုက်ညထဲ ပိတ်မိနေပါစေဆိုတာပဲ

ငါ့အားနည်းချက်တွေကို နင်က ယူသွားပြီး
သန်မာတဲ့ ငါအဖြစ် အသစ်တစ်ဖန် ပြန်မွေးဖွားလာပေးပါ

နင်ငါ့ရဲ့အချိန်တွေကို ရပ်တန့်ပစ်စေချင်တယ်
မီးတောက်တွေ ငါ့ကို တောက်လောင်နေတဲ့အခိုက် အတန့်မှာ
နောက်ဆုံးမှာတော့ ငါ အသက်ရှူနိုင်သွားတယ် 
နာကျင်မှုရဲ့လှိုင်းထဲမှာတောင်
ပြာတွေအဖြစ်ပြောင်းပြီး ပြန်ရှင်သန်မယ်
ငါနာကျင်ရလေလေ ပိုရှင်သန်နိုင်လေလေပဲ 
တောက်လောင်ပြီးသားပြာထဲက တစ်ဖန်မွေးလာတယ်

ထာဝရဆိုတာမရှိပါဘူး ကလေး ရယ်
ငါ ပြန်လည် ဖူးပွင့်လာတော့မယ်  
ငါ့ခန္ဓာကိုယ်မှာ ဆီတွေသွန်းလောင်း ပြီးထပ်တောက်လောင်မယ်  

ငါ မရပ်တန့်ချင်ဘူး

"နင်ကြောက်စရာမလိုဘူး" လို့ နတ်သားတွေက တိုးတိုးပြော သွားတယ် 
ဒီမှောင်မဲခြင်းက မင်းကို ဖန်တီးတာ  
မခံစားဖူးတဲ့ ခံစားချက်တွေကိုခံစားလိုက်  
မီးထဲမှာ တောက်လောင်နေတာ တောင် ထပ်တောက်လောင်ချင်နေတုန်းပဲ

အမှောင်ထဲမှာ ပျောက်ဆုံးနေတဲ့ငါ့ကိုတောင်  
ငါ့ကို တောက်ပစေတယ်

နင်ငါ့ရဲ့အချိန်တွေကို ရပ်တန့်ပစ်စေချင်တယ်
မီးတောက်တွေ ငါ့ကို တောက်လောင်နေတဲ့အခိုက် အတန့်မှာ
နောက်ဆုံးမှာတော့ ငါ အသက်ရှူနိုင်သွားတယ် 
နာကျင်မှုရဲ့လှိုင်းထဲမှာတောင်
ပြာတွေအဖြစ်ပြောင်းပြီး ပြန်ရှင်သန်မယ်

ငါနာကျင်ရလေလေ ပိုရှင်သန်နိုင်လေလေပဲ 
တောက်လောင်ပြီးသားပြာထဲက တစ်ဖန်မွေးလာတယ်
ထာဝရဆိုတာမရှိပါဘူး ကလေး ရယ်
ငါ ပြန်လည် ဖူးပွင့်လာတော့မယ်  
ငါ့ခန္ဓာကိုယ်မှာ ဆီတွေသွန်းလောင်း ပြီးထပ်တောက်လောင်မယ်  
ငါ ရပ်တန့်ချင်ဘူး

ပြာတွေကြားက တစ်ဖန်မွေးဖွားလာပြီး
မကောင်းတဲ့ အပိုင်းတွေ ငါ့ဆီက ဖယ်ပစ်မယ်
ညလွန်တဲ့အခါမှာ ပိုကောင်းတဲ့ လူအဖြစ်မွေးဖွားလာပြီး 
အတောင်ပံသစ်တွေ ဖြန့်ကာ နေ့သစ်ဆီပျံသန်းမယ်
နာကျင်ရလေလေ ပိုရှင်သန်နိုင်လေလေပဲ
ထာ၀ရဆိုတာမရှိပါဘူး ကလေးရေ
မီးတောက်တွေထဲမှာ ငါ့ ဖြတ်သန်းခဲ့တာ ခြေရာ တွေ ကျန်နေ တော့မှာ

text:
[Verse 1:]
11:11, when angels hover around my bed
I have a match on, I wish I was locked in the dark night

[Pre-Chorus]
Get rid of my weakness
Make a new me

[Chorus]
I want you to stop time
The moment the flame burns me, finally, I can breathe
In the wave of pain, I'm turning into ashes
Live again like oh, oh, oh~

I'm about to bloom again, pour oil all over my body
Light thе flame like oh, oh, oh, ~I don't wanna stop

Angеls whisper to me

Even If i burn again, I burn it more
Can't get enough, oh, no-oh

Make me bright

[Chorus]
I want you to stop time
The moment the flame burns me, finally, I can breathe
In the wave of pain
I'm turning into ashes, live again like oh, oh, oh~
The more it hurts, the more alive I am
A new born from ashes, nothing lasts forever, baby
I'm about to bloom again, pour oil all over my body
Light the flame like oh, oh, oh,~ I don't wanna stop

[Interlude]
Even I burn again, I burn it more, can't get enough
Oh, no-oh (Ooh-ah), oh, no-oh

So beautiful, new life
When new skin renewal on my body after peeling the old one
After midnight, a new life will begin
Spread my wings to a new day like oh, oh, oh~
The more it hurts, the more alive I am
A new born from ashes 
Nothing lasts forever, baby
Burn it up, make it bluer
My footsteps will remain in the flames like oh, oh, oh~

This song makes me feel nostalgic, like when I used to immerse myself in fantasy world. It's a complex and vague feeling, real like rainy days, yet surreal like heaven. 
The background in the video also matches the song perfectly. 
I started exploring LS's discography after watching Sana and Sakura's interview. With music of this quality, there's no need to worry about their listener base

author: @LesserafimGfriend
text:
HOW TO STREAM ON SPOTIFY!

Sign in to your Spotify account. 
Both Premium and Free accounts count towards streaming.

• Listen to songs at a volume above 25% and do not turn off the app or tab, or your stream will not be counted.

• Disable shuffle, automix, and autoplay.• The focus song should be repeated at least 20 times in the playlist and after this it counts towards the total streams

• DO NOT play playlists on repeat!Save at least 3 or more playlists. Free accounts should not skip ads.

• DO NOT use VPN.▲ 

For streams to be counted with maximum efficiency, use up to 6 accounts per IP (WiFi). If you can use 6 accounts to stream, there will be no problem. Do what you can to help without burdening yourself.

Translation 

Eleven-eleven
When angels hover around my bed
I have a match on

Make a new me

Like oh, oh, oh
I don't wanna stop

This darkness creates you
Feel the feelings you never felt
Even I burn again, I burn it more, can't get enough
Oh, no, oh, no

Even I'm still black in the darkness
Make me bright

I want you to stop time
The moment the flame burns me
Finally, I can breathe
In the wave of pain
I'm turning into ashes, live again
Like oh, oh, oh
The more it hurts, the more alive I am
A new born from ashes
Nothing lasts forever, baby
I'm about to bloom again
Pour oil all over my body, light the flame
Like oh, oh, oh
I don't wanna stop

Even I burn again, I burn it more, can't get enough
Oh, no, oh, no


So beautiful, new life
The moment new skin renewal on my body
After peeling the old one
After midnight, a new life will begin
Spread my wings to a new day
Like oh, oh, oh
The more it hurts, the more alive I am
A new born from ashes
Nothing lasts forever, baby
Burn it up, make it bluer
My footsteps will remain in the flames
Like oh, oh, oh

author: @KoliaVeeOfficial
text:
[Verse 1: Huh Yunjin, Kazuha]
Eleven-eleven
When angels hover around my bed
I have a match on
I wish I was locked in the dark night

[Pre-Chorus: Kim Chaewon]
Get rid of my weakness
Make a new me

[Chorus: Huh Yunjin, Hong Eunchae, Kazuha, Kim Chaewon]
I want you to stop time
The moment the flame burns me
Finally, I can breathe
In the wave of pain
I'm turning into ashes, live again
Like oh, oh, oh
The more it hurts, the more alive I am
A new born in ashes
Nothing lasts forever, baby
I'm about to bloom again
Pour oil all over my body, light the flamе
Like oh, oh, oh
I don't wanna stop

[Verse 2: Kazuha, Hong Eunchae, Sakura]
"Don't be afraid," angels whispеr to me
This darkness creates you
Feel the feelings you never felt
Even I burn again, I burn it more, can't get enough
Oh, no, oh, no

[Pre-Chorus: Huh Yunjin]
Even I'm still black in the darkness
Make me bright

[Chorus: Kazuha, Hong Eunchae, Huh Yunjin, Sakura]
I want you to stop time
The moment the flame burns me
Finally, I can breathe
In the wave of pain
I'm turning into ashes, live again
Like oh, oh, oh
The more it hurts, the more alive I am
A new born from ashes
Nothing lasts forever, baby
I'm about to bloom again
Pour oil all over my body, light the flame
Like oh, oh, oh
I don't wanna stop

[Bridge]
Even I burn again, I burn it more, can't get enough
Oh, no, oh, no

[Chorus: Kim Chaewon, Huh Yunjin, Kazuha, Sakura]
So beautiful, new life
The moment new skin renewal on my body
After peeling the old one
After midnight, a new life will begin
Spread my wings to a new day
Like oh, oh, oh
The more it hurts, the more alive I am
A new born from ashes
Nothing lasts forever, baby
Burn it up, make it bluer
My footsteps will remain in the flames
Like oh, oh, oh

author: @sairrrin
text:
#HUHYUNJIN talking about writing 'Ash':

"While writing ‘Ash’, I was really focused on wanting to express the moment between life and death, but also the pain that comes with that. I especially wanted to talk about that pain because, without it, you miss out on a lot of gratitude and appreciation for the beauty of life itself.

The image of a matchstick also served as inspiration for the lyrics because “you have to set your body on fire to maintain the flame”. That represented how you have to surrender yourself to your passion and, sometimes, you undergo that pain and overcome that hardship to keep your flame alive. Even if you use up all of your body and it feels like it’s ended, you’ll just rise from it again. In that sense, I think by just going through pain, you’re able to discover a new self that you didn’t know was there before, and I think we all went through that."

text: The song is a powerful anthem of self-transformation. It encourages listeners to embrace pain as a means of growth, to let go of the old self, and to rise stronger and more alive. text: Esta canción esta increíble. Es una pena que no podrá ser promocionada en la TV Coreana. Soy Fearnot. He apoyado a las chicas desde el día 1. Seré honesta. La canción HOT es buena, un poco corta. Podía tener un final más explosivo. Es Débil para ser la canción principal y un concepto HOT. Sobretodo Después de lo que venía haciendo LE SSERAFIM. Espero estar equivocada y que les vaya genial a las chicas. Pero nose a que juega su agencia. Ellas podían tener una canción principal más increíble y esta secundaria #LE_SSERAFIM
